engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_who_use_drugs: Funds are limited so we look to have information provided through other groups that perform this work such as SUD Coalition (Substance Use Disorder) and Martha's Vineyard Community Services

disparities_assessment.barriers: Health Care access on island is limited regardless of race, wealth, and stigma. Addressing issue will be more of a regional approach

behavioral_health_assessment.admin_data_sources: Information from Police and/or EMS, if available, used for report.

innovation_practices.other_methods: Looking at potential regional pooling options

planning.process: Our municipality conducted its own planning process.

how_spent: Other (please specify):: Pooled funds with other towns to support island wide SUD Coalition

Other (please specify):: As member of Dukes County, we pool funds to provide and support Martha's Vineyard Community Services regional human service programs. 21,813 was for the CORE program which supports mental health, substance use disorder counseling and care coordination for people 55 and older. 12,737.01 to support Homeless prevention as the small number of homeless in our community are usually also in need of SUD services.
